review: Visited the Kannan restaurant during my visit to tirthan valley..The restaurant is located on NH-21 on the way to Mandi(approx 10km) before Mandi... Parking is outside the hotel.. Rooms are available for stay as confirmed on reception.. Restaurant was spacious and food was good..we ordered chicken and Dal along with Noodles.. In dessert had gulab jamuns.. Rates are pocket friendly..
name: vjm1984
userloc: National Capital Territory of Delhi, India
